column4: Is it possible to install Ubuntu on a laptop with only 32mb of ram? The installer says it requires 64mb.
Yes you can, change your WM however to FLUX or ICEWM.
You will be ok if you do not use KDE/GNOME..
Installed Xubuntu, same thing with XFCE - but with 32megs.. I would install Flux or ICEWM.
